newsitem.title: EU: EP INSTITUTIONAL COMMITTEE AGENDA - OCT 28-29.
newsitem.headline: EP INSTITUTIONAL COMMITTEE AGENDA - OCT 28-29.

text.p: Committee on Institutional Affairs [[ Monday 28 October 1996 ]] 0.1 1. Adoption of draft agenda (PE219.954 ) 2. Approval of minutes of meetings of: - 16 September 1996 (PE219.524 ) - 25 and 26 September 1996 (PE219.527 ) 3. Chairman's announcements ===] In the presence of the Council and Commission 4. Participation in the institutional system of the EU and IGC by social repres entatives and other citizens (T04618) [1] INI0474 INI0474 + INST Fond R HERZOG Philippe. (GUE) (PE218.253/A ) - Adoption of draft report 5. Exchange of views with Mr Anastassopoulos, chairman of the EP delegation to the interinstitutional working party on priorities in information policy ([2] ) 6. Scope of the codecision procedure (Commission report under Article 189b (8)) (T04963) COS0449 SEC(96)1225 C4-0464/96 + INST Fond (PE219.530 ) - Consideration of draft report 7. Relations between the European Parliament and the national parliaments (T04634) INI0485 INI0485 + INST Fond R NEYTS-UYTTEBROECK An (ELD) (PE218.746 ) - Consideration of working document 8. EU progress in 1995: European Council report to EP (pursuant to Article D of EU Treaty) (T04933) COS0434 C4-409/96 C4-0409/96 + INST Fond R VALVERDE LOPEZ J. (PPE) (PE219.953/A ) - Consideration of draft report - Deadline for tabling amendments 9.1 Monitoring the Intergovernmental Conference - 1. Citizenship, fundamental rights and uniform electoral procedure: AGLIETTA/Green Group - 2. Social dimension, employment and the environmental dimension: BARROS MOURA/PSE - 3. CFSP and common defence: SPAAK/ELDR - 4. Openness, transparency, simplification and codification: BONDE/EDN - 5. Institutions, subsidiarity and flexibility: DELL'ALBA/ARE 9.2 Monitoring the Intergovernmental Conference (continued) - 6.1 Third pillar: CEDERSCHIOLD/PPE - 6.2 Majority voting, unanimity, weighting of votes and legislative procedures: SCHWAIGER/PPE - 7. Financing budget, fraud: MARRA/UPE - 8. Role of the Committee of the Regions and Economic Cohesion: GUTIERREZ DIAZ /GUE 10. Exchange of views with Mr Brok, Parliament's representative, on development s at the Intergovernmental Conference ([3] ) 11. The constitutional status of European political parties (T04615) [4] INI0471 INI0471 + INST Fond R TSATSOS Dimitrios. (PSE) (PE218.741/AB ) - Adoption of draft report 12. Any other business 13. Date of next meeting (extraordinary meeting in Brussels) (PE/XVI/OJ/96-24) - Adoption of the draft report by Mr Bourlanges and Mr De Giovanni on the scope of the codecision procedure (PE219.530 ) 13.1 13.2 13.3

[FOOTNOTES]1. ) The vote will be held on Monday 28 October at 3 p.m. 2. ) Monday 28 October after Item 4. 3. ) Tuesday 29 October at 9 a.m. 4. ) The vote will be held on Tuesday 29 October after Item 10. - FIN - END OF DOCUMENT.
